file name: Abandoned horse in the forest - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Meeting the Witch - AGG 2025]], [[Witches' ritual - AGG 2025]]
[[Danse macabre - AGG 2025]]
[[Telling own story with a song - AGG 2025]], [[Falling unconscious from undead encounter - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character witnesses a group of ghosts carrying a grave into a lake.

goes_to: [[Happy ending - AGG 2025]], [[Sad ending - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character is convinced that their love is requited. Spring has suddenly come to support their fantasy. But is this just a dream?

goes_to: [[Demons keep the lovers apart - AGG 2025]], [[Witch's love enchantment - AGG 2025]]

file name: Demons keep the lovers apart - AGG 2025
argument: After the evil pact, the lover despairs trying to reach their loved one

file name: Despair and homesickness. Giving up their dreams - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Happy ending - AGG 2025]], [[Sad ending - AGG 2025]]
music: [[In der Fremde Op. 39 n. 1]], [[Ich stand in dunklen Traümen Op. 13 n.1]]
argument: The character's morale has reached the bottom. They are longing for home, giving up their dreams of happiness.

file name: Elf of the woods creates charming illusion - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Falling asleep - AGG 2025]]
argument: The will and vital energy of the character fall apart due to the natural spirit's charms, loosing consciousness.

goes_to: [[Mistrust of animals - AGG 2025]]
comes_from: [[Elf of the woods creates charming illusion - AGG 2025]]
argument: Either the male character chooses to fall asleep and dreams of supernatural things, or he decides to stay awake... and have supernatural encounters.

file name: Falling unconscious from undead encounter - AGG 2025
argument: The character encounters vis-à-vis a skeletal undead, which attracts them without allowing any escape. The character feels their life being drained away and loses consciousness.

file name: Following path and getting lost - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Reaching higher ground during a storm - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character tries to follow a small path through the forest to reach their destination. They are menaced by despair and horror while traversing the dark forest...

comes_from: [[Despair and homesickness. Giving up their dreams - AGG 2025]], [[Daydreaming about eternal love - AGG 2025]]
music: [[Hochzeitslied D. 463]], [[Du bist mir lieb]], [[Liebst du um schönheit GMW 43]]
argument: They get married and live happily ever after until they die.

file name: Lonely man is burying a coffin - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Telling own story with a song - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character wakes up in the morning and sees a man burying a coffin into the graveyard.

goes_to: [[Demonic deception - AGG 2025]], [[Recognition of the evil sorceress - AGG 2025]]
comes_from: [[Abandoned horse in the forest - AGG 2025]], [[Staying awake - AGG 2025]]

goes_to: [[Abandoned horse in the forest - AGG 2025]]
[[Daydreaming about eternal love - AGG 2025]], [[Despair and homesickness. Giving up their dreams - AGG 2025]]
comes_from: [[Recognition of the evil sorceress - AGG 2025]], [[Prayer of the Hermit - AGG 2025]]
argument: One of the characters, or both, sees/ are seen in the moonlight.

goes_to: [[Moonlight -  AGG 2025]]
comes_from: [[Telling own story with a song - AGG 2025]]
music: [[Gedichte der Königin Maria Stuart Op.135 n.5]]
argument: The Hermit recites a prayer, revealing a hint about their past.

file name: Reaching higher ground during a storm - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Falling asleep - AGG 2025]], [[Staying awake - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character is lost and tries to reach the top of a hill to find direction. A storm blocks their way.

file name: Recognition of the evil sorceress - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Moonlight -  AGG 2025]]
argument: The character realizes the real identity of the Witch.

comes_from: [[Daydreaming about eternal love - AGG 2025]], [[Despair and homesickness. Giving up their dreams - AGG 2025]]
music: [[Gretchen am Spinnrade D.118]], [[Wie viele Zeit verlor Ich IHW 15 n. 37]]
argument: Realises that the loved one was unworthy and is disillusioned and facing an empty existence.

file name: Seek shelter in abandoned monastery - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Lonely man is burying a coffin - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character seeks shelter from the rain in an abandoned nun's monastery.

goes_to: [[Meeting the Witch - AGG 2025]]
comes_from: [[Reaching higher ground during a storm - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character forces themselves to stay awake during the long night in the woods.

goes_to: [[Elf of the woods creates charming illusion - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character decides to not take the main road, convinced that their instinct will find a shortcut between the woods.

file name: Telling own story with a song - AGG 2025
goes_to: [[Prayer of the Hermit - AGG 2025]]
comes_from: [[Witches' ritual - AGG 2025]], [[Danse macabre - AGG 2025]], [[Lonely man is burying a coffin - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character tells their own story to The Hermit. They cannot hide their anguish any more, bursting into tears.

goes_to: [[Following path and getting lost - AGG 2025]], [[Taking a "shortcut" - AGG 2025]]
music: [[Dunkel wie dunkel in Wald und in Feld Op. 43 n.1]]
argument: The character is wandering through the deep, dark forest, looking for a path to lead them back to their beloved one.

goes_to: [[Ancient grave - AGG 2025]], [[Seek shelter in abandoned monastery - AGG 2025]]
music: [[Wie rafft ich mich auf Op. 32 n.1]]
argument: The character has escaped from their captivity and is wandering through a desolate churchyard, while rains falls.

goes_to: [[Daydreaming about eternal love - AGG 2025]], [[Despair and homesickness. Giving up their dreams - AGG 2025]]
argument: The Witch uses one of her enchantments to grasp the hearth of the character.

goes_to: [[Telling own story with a song - AGG 2025]], [[Demons keep the lovers apart - AGG 2025]]
argument: The character witnesses a magical gathering of witches, chanting and dancing to perform some evil spell.
